narrative: Enhanced QuadrantityReflection node to accept variables and output reflections so other nodes can reference them. Added ledger documentation to clarify purpose.
purpose: Advance reflection tracking within AgentFlow so persona insights can influence downstream behaviors.
user_input: Ensure packages/components/nodes/agentflow/QuadrantityReflection/ works fine, go over any related code and advance the component.  See how it could relate to existing components by its purpose and enhance it
scene: Before: reflections were static notes with no programmatic output. Now: reflections can be injected via variables from Quadrantity and emitted as objects for subsequent nodes to utilize.
